show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: Massive Encroachment Of The President’s Powers: A Warning

title: Massive Encroachment Of The President’s Powers: A Warning
content:
Powers thus obtained will never be yielded back. This trend should now be seen as a national emergency but, of course, will not be.
The momentum itself is hard to stop.
Listen to Rand Paul outline the dangers.
Thirteen facts you may not know about economics (interesting and fun – not turgid and boring – I promise!
) A few words about the Eric Cantor affair.
The process of being wrong.
Why we cling to wrong beliefs even when the contrary evidence is presented in clear format.
The biases which affect our decisions.
A few statistics on the world’s total indebtedness.
The insanity of all it all is breathtaking.
Future generations will have a hard time believing these current statistics.
